div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType where concept is-a _ActRelationsipObjective

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType
CodeDisplayDefinition
_ActRelationsipObjectiveAct Relationsip ObjectiveThe target act is a desired outcome of the source act. Source is any act (typically an intervention). Target must be an observation in criterion mood.

description.value: The target act is a desired outcome of the source act. Source is any act (typically an intervention). Target must be an observation in criterion mood.
